text: Cratena lineata is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Cratena lineata (Eliot, 1905). Accessed on 2018-02-17. ==Distribution== This species was described from Zanzibar. It has been reported from widespread localities throughout the Indo-Pacific Oceans.Rudman, W.B., 2000 (March 13) Cratena lineata (Eliot, 1905). [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1905
title: Cratena lineata
